outputs.output_descr: Support quality seed multiplication (improved quality and variety), capacity enhancement at the farm level, providing appropriate technology, seed management, policy review and reform skills, to increase productivity and food availability.

project_descr: The project seeks to contribute to food security by raising agricultural productivity through improved varieties and quality of seeds.
project_title: Improved Seed Production for Sustainable Agriculture

subnational.name: Maekjon Foundation Seed Farm, Kangdong County
Daes Certified Seed Farm, Sukchon county
Up seed Multiplication Farm, Unpa County
South Pyongan Province Seed Inspection Centre
